LanguageData.VME_TerribleBonfire.stages.0.label: terrible bonfire
LanguageData.VME_TerribleBonfire.stages.0.description: Some pathetic little flames drifted around, and they went away too soon. "Bon" fire? More like "Lame" fire.
LanguageData.VME_LacklusterBonfire.stages.0.label: lackluster bonfire
LanguageData.VME_LacklusterBonfire.stages.0.descripti: We were expecting a wondrous conflagration, and instead we got an oversized campfire. At least it was kinda entertaining.
LanguageData.VME_GoodBonfire.stages.0.label: good bonfire
LanguageData.VME_GoodBonfire.stages.0.description: The flames rose and crackled majestically over the settlement, and it lifted all our spirits considerably.
LanguageData.VME_GloriousBonfire.stages.0.label: glorious bonfire
LanguageData.VME_GloriousBonfire.stages.0.description: It was super fun and we really connected with each other with the shared experience.
